mapper.select: select * from host where h_userid like #{h_userid}
select count(h_userid) from Host where h_userid=#{h_userid}
select count(h_email) from Host where h_email=#{h_email}
mapper.update: update Host set h_profile_img= #{h_profile_img}, h_passwd=#{h_passwd}, h_email=#{h_email}, h_phone=#{h_phone}, h_manager_num=#{h_manager_num} where h_userid=#{h_userid}
mapper.select: select * from ( select rownum as rn, A.* from ( select r.room_idx, r.h_userid, r.room_name, r.room_price, r.contents, r.city, r.country, r.address1, r.address2, r.zipcode, r.check_in, r.check_out, r.beds, r.baths, r.room_type, r.lat, r.lng, r.admin_confirm, rp.photo1, rp.photo2, rp.photo3, rp.photo4 from rooms r join room_photo rp on r.room_idx = rp.room_idx where r.h_userid=#{h_userid} order by check_in desc) A ) where rn between #{start} and #{end}

select * from ( select rownum as rn, A.* from ( select r.room_idx, r.h_userid, r.room_name, r.room_price, r.contents, r.city, r.country, r.address1, r.address2, r.zipcode, r.check_in, r.check_out, r.beds, r.baths, r.room_type, r.lat, r.lng, r.admin_confirm, rp.photo1, rp.photo2, rp.photo3, rp.photo4 from rooms r join room_photo rp on r.room_idx = rp.room_idx where r.h_userid=#{h_userid} and admin_confirm=#{select} order by check_in desc) A ) where rn between #{start} and #{end}
select room_name from Rooms where h_userid=#{h_userid} and admin_confirm ='승인'
select count(*) from rooms where h_userid=#{h_userid} and admin_confirm='승인'

select r.h_userid, sum(r.room_price) from rooms r, reservations rs where r.room_idx=rs.room_idx and r.check_in between #{check_in} and add_months(#{check_in},1) and r.h_userid=#{h_userid} and not(rs.res_state = '취소완료') group by r.h_userid
